mapper.select: select DOGLIST_NUM, DOG_KOR_NAME, DOG_EN_NAME, DOG_SIZE, DOG_OUTFIT , DOG_PERSONALITY, DOG_REC, DOG_DIS, DOG_COLOR, DOG_COMMENT from DOG_LIST WHERE DOG_EN_NAME= 'Grey_Hound'
select DOGLIST_NUM, DOG_KOR_NAME, DOG_EN_NAME, DOG_SIZE, DOG_OUTFIT , DOG_PERSONALITY, DOG_REC, DOG_DIS, DOG_COLOR, DOG_COMMENT from DOG_LIST WHERE DOG_EN_NAME = #{dog_en_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTCORRECT (FILENAME, DOG_KOR_NAME, UPLOADE) VALUES (#{sfile_name}, #{dog_kor_name}, SYSDATE)
